
### Unix API summary  {.smaller}


* spawn and wait for program: <code>fork</code> (copy), then 

   * in child: setup, then <code>execv</code>, etc. (replace copy)
   * in parent: <code>waitpid</code>

* files: open, read and/or write, close 

   * one interface for regular files, pipes, network, devices, â€¦

* file descriptors are indices into per-process array 

   * index 0, 1, 2 = stdin, stdout, stderr
   * <code>dup2</code> --- assign one index to another
   * <code>close</code> --- deallocate index

* redirection 

   * open() to create new file descriptors
   * dup2 in child to assign file descriptor to index 0, 1
